parameters.definition: Total units of tooth medication available
Units of tooth medication required for a small bone
Units of meat required for a small bone
Units of tooth medication required for a large bone
Units of meat required for a large bone
Minimum percentage of total bones made that must be small
Minimum number of large bones to be made

description: An dog hospital has \param{TotalMedication} units of tooth medication to make both small and large bones. A small bone requires \param{SmallMedication} units of tooth medication and \param{SmallMeat} units of meat. A large bone requires \param{LargeMedication} units of tooth medication and \param{LargeMeat} units of meat. Since most dogs prefer the small bones, at least \param{MinSmallBonePercentage} of the bones made must be small. In addition, the hospital must make at least \param{MinLargeBones} large bones. How many of each bone should be made to minimize the amount of meat needed?
